channel.title: Need Players: Dungeon World: Beyond the Slave-Pit (1 of 3)
channel.description:
Had to bow out of tonights game due to being sick. Super bummed so hoping someone can take my place.
What happens to the survivors of the Slave-Pit of Drazhu? Stay tuned to find out as we flesh out the survivor’s backstory and we play to find out what they do next!
This will be a DW series with only 4 players, each with a standard playbook.
Today 8:00 PM → Today 11:00 PM [Session 1 (4 players) ](https://bit.ly/2UVdhuS) April 17, 2019 8:00 PM → April 17, 2019 11:00 PM [Session 2 (4 players) ](https://bit.ly/2urXic8) April 24, 2019 8:00 PM → April 24, 2019 11:00 PM [Session 3 (4 players) ](https://bit.ly/2uo6qyH)
